How It Works

Simple, powerful, and intelligent

01

Upload Documents

Add PDFs, guidelines, manuals, or any text-based documents to your knowledge base.

02

AI Processing

Our system chunks, embeds, and indexes your documents for optimal retrieval.

03

Ask Questions

Chat naturally with the AI assistant to get accurate, cited answers from your documents.

Built for Knowledge Workers

Our AI Document Assistant leverages state-of-the-art Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology to provide accurate, contextual answers from your document library. Whether you're working with medical guidelines, research papers, training manuals, or any knowledge base, our system delivers instant, reliable insights.
